name: Repin Develop Casual
description:
Repin Develop Casual is a gaming platform that includes many games, the number of which is only increasing. Play premium and mini-games of various genres! Get achievements, compete with friends or complete levels in cooperative mode on splitscreen. From racing to shooters, 2d and 3d. All this is designed and optimized for a huge number of devices and operating systems Linux, Android, Windows.
In addition to mini-games, demo versions of future new premium games will be available to you for free!
Thanks to the integration with the Steam service, you will have the opportunity to use the Remote Play Together function and play cooperative and competitive games online!
All this is available to you absolutely for free!
